!Bunny Money: During this Eventa, residents Fantasy Isle to visit each city to provide free teleports to the island. During eventovyh drop periods EVENT managers will sell the Rabbit Transformation Scrolls. You can use the Rabbit Transformation Scrolls everywhere, but you can only find the treasures on Fantasy Isle. You can buy Rabbit Transformation Scroll only once in 12 hours for your account. As soon as you transform into a rabbit, you will receive two special skill: Rabbit Magic Eye and Rabbit Tornado. Skill Rabbit Magic Eye allows you to see the next hidden treasure chests. Once you successfully find a treasure chest, using the skill Rabbit Magic Eye, creating three treasure chests. (they disappear again after 18 seconds) To open the chests use the skill Rabbit Tornado. Sometimes it will appear special and rare treasure chests, shooting fireworks at the opening. These chests contain random awards like the top A-grade weapons, entire Treasure Sacks and parts Treasure Sacks. Rabbits can be excellent jumpers, but they are not the best swimmers. Your transformation into a rabbit will run for 10 minutes, but it instantly disappears if you get into the water. As a rabbit, to stay on dry land!
